DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , non-randomised , control , single-surgeon , single-center post-market clinical follow study whereby patient undergo routine cataract surgery bilateral implantation recently introduce TGA ( Therapeutics Goods Authority , Australia ) approve trifocal intraocular lens FineVision Evo ( PhysIOL , Liège , Belgium ) . The primary secondary effectiveness data visual acuity , defocus curve , contrast sensitivity adverse event collect .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study Investigate Visual Performance IOL : FineVision HP
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects participate trial attend total 8 study visit ( 1 preoperative , 2 operative 5 postoperative ) period 3 month , surgeon 's standard follow protocol bilateral cataract surgery IOL implantation . Subjects would option unscheduled visit require medically . Primary endpoint data collect final visit . Data analyse do end support study publication plan .
DOC.criteria: Cataracteous eye comorbidity Spontaneously emit desire spectacle independence surgery realistic expectation . Availability , willingness sufficient cognitive awareness comply examination procedure Signed informed consent Unrealistic expectation Irregular astigmatism Regular corneal astigmatism > 0.75 D one eye measure automatic keratometer ( regularity determine topography keratometry ) Difficulty cooperation ( distance home , general health condition ) Acute chronic disease illness would increase risk confound study result ( e.g . diabetes mellitus ( retinopathy ) , immunocompromised , glaucoma etc… ) Any ocular comorbidity History ocular trauma prior ocular surgery include refractive procedure Capsule zonular abnormality may affect postoperative centration tilt lens ( e.g . pseudoexfoliation syndrome , chronic Uveitis , Marfan 's syndrome ) Pupil abnormality ( nonreactive , tonic pupil , abnormally shape pupil pupil dilate mesopic/scotopic condition ) Complicated surgery
